Description_lang: Achillite exposes his an anima core upon death creating a pool of corrosive anima, inflicting $350045s1 Holy damage every $350045t1 sec.The exposed anima core releases volatile anima orbs every $t1 sec that explode upon contact with a player, inflicting $349999s1 Holy damage and decreasing damage dealt by $349999s2% to all players within $349999A1 yards for $349999d. This effect stacks.Players afflicted with $@spellname349627 will consume any volatile anima orb they come in contact with, negating the explosion and increasing all damage dealt by $350010s1% for $350010d. This effect stacks.
